title: Table 167 - Row 22
clause_text: 10.: 18. | Whether area for inclusive housing is required as per Regulation No.3.8 ? Please state the details.: (a) What are the requirements of parking spaces under the Regulation No.8.0 ? How many are proposed ? | : Scooter | : Scooter
